name: Fantasy Unfinished (2-pack)
description:
M E R C E N A R Y M A I D E N
================================
Genre: Fantasy RPG
Apart from the likely unbalanced battles, random voice acting, and mixmatch of protraits, this mostly plays out as normal demo.

The game stars an elf named Sylria, a unconfident girl who goes on a missoin with an arrogant half-elf called Zakki. They go to a villaged called Ironheart in order to enter the nearby mines.

Battles are random since it was easier to do it that way for now. XD

Now I am completely rebooting this story and game into something better.

T H E S Y L V A N M A I D A S T R A Y
============================================
Genre: Puzzle / Maze
This was created in a month for a spring game jam on a niche forum. My original idea was to have this be a pac-man maze game where you collect something that adds to your overall score.

I planned to have obstacles that could take away hearts such as traps or monsters that move in set positions, but I didn't make it that far.

Right now it's just a story with one level.
